com.navaile.enigma4k

Class Enigma4K

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navaile.enigma4k.Enigma4K

  • public class Enigma4K
extends Object
    A next generation Enigma based on the original design. Software Design The software was designed with a laymen in mind.
    Author:
    navaile

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enigma4K

        public Enigma4K(String passPhrase,
                String handle,
                String msgID,
                int roCount,
                int pbCount)
        Builds a new enigma machine.
        Parameters:
        passPhrase - pass phrase, password
        handle - recipient name/email/handle
        msgID - msgID generated by Enigma4K.genMsgID()
        roCount - rotor count, 97 - 5000
        pbCount - plugboard count, 97 - 500

      • encryptText

        public static String encryptText(String passPhrase,
                                 String handle,
                                 int roCount,
                                 int pbCount,
                                 Long dirSeed,
                                 String plainText)
                          throws Exception
        Static encryption.
        Parameters:
        passPhrase - pass phrase or password
        handle - recipient email, handle, or name
        roCount - rotor count
        pbCount - plugboard count
        dirSeed - directory randomization seed, default is null
        plainText - text message to encrypt
        Returns:
        encrypted text
        Throws:
        Exception

        pbCount - plugboard count

      • randomizeDirectory

        public void randomizeDirectory(Long seed)
        This method will randomize the directory based on the seed supplied. Randomizing the directory increases security however both parties must use the same seed when randomizing the directory to ensure that both parties have the same directory.
